timer.heading: Get 50% off before it's too late ⏰

html: <bob-panel id='content'>

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='lg' path='timer.mode' label='Timer mode' placeholder='Choose mode' value='{{timer.mode}}' options='[{"label":"Countdown to Date","value":"date"},{"label":"Personal Countdown","value":"personal"},{"label":"Number Counter","value":"number"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='timer.heading' label='Heading' hint='Get 50% off before it\'s too late' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='timer.countdownToDate.targetDate' label='Target Date' show-if="timer.mode == 'date'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='timer.countdownToDate.targetTime' label='Target Time' show-if="timer.mode == 'date'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='lg' path='timer.countdownToDate.timezone' label='Timezone' placeholder='Choose timezone' value='{{timer.countdownToDate.timezone}}' options='[{"label":"Browser","value":"browser"},{"label":"UTC","value":"UTC"},{"label":"EST","value":"America/New_York"},{"label":"PST","value":"America/Los_Angeles"},{"label":"CET","value":"Europe/Paris"},{"label":"JST","value":"Asia/Tokyo"}]' show-if="timer.mode == 'date'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.personalCountdown.timeAmount' label='Duration amount' show-if="timer.mode == 'personal'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.personalCountdown.timeUnit' label='Duration unit' placeholder='Choose unit' value='{{timer.personalCountdown.timeUnit}}' options='[{"label":"Minutes","value":"minutes"},{"label":"Hours","value":"hours"},{"label":"Days","value":"days"}]' show-if="timer.mode == 'personal'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='timer.personalCountdown.repeatEnabled' label='Repeat countdown' show-if="timer.mode == 'personal'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.personalCountdown.repeatAmount' label='Repeat after' show-if="timer.mode == 'personal' && timer.personalCountdown.repeatEnabled == 'true'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.personalCountdown.repeatUnit' label='Repeat unit' placeholder='Choose unit' value='{{timer.personalCountdown.repeatUnit}}' options='[{"label":"Minutes","value":"minutes"},{"label":"Hours","value":"hours"},{"label":"Days","value":"days"}]' show-if="timer.mode == 'personal' && timer.personalCountdown.repeatEnabled == 'true'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.numberCounter.targetNumber' label='Target number' show-if="timer.mode == 'number'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.numberCounter.startingNumber' label='Starting number' show-if="timer.mode == 'number'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.numberCounter.duration' label='Duration (seconds)' show-if="timer.mode == 'number'" />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Widget layout' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='layout.type' label='Layout' placeholder='Choose layout' value='{{layout.type}}' options='[{"label":"Inline","value":"inline"},{"label":"Full-width section","value":"full-width"},{"label":"Top bar","value":"top-bar"},{"label":"Bottom bar","value":"bottom-bar"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='layout.gap' label='Gap (px)' />
<tooldrawer-divider />
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Stage/Pod layout' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.widthMode' label='Pod width' placeholder='Choose width' value='{{pod.widthMode}}' options='[{"label":"Wrap pod to widget","value":"wrap"},{"label":"Full width","value":"full"},{"label":"Fixed width","value":"fixed"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.contentWidth' label='Width in pixels' show-if="pod.widthMode == 'fixed'" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='stage.alignment' label='Pod alignment' placeholder='Choose alignment' value='{{stage.alignment}}' options='[{"label":"Center","value":"center"},{"label":"Align left","value":"left"},{"label":"Align right","value":"right"},{"label":"Align top","value":"top"},{"label":"Align bottom","value":"bottom"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.radiusLinked' label='Link pod corners' value='{{pod.radiusLinked}}' default='false' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radius' label='Corner radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radius}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'true' || pod.radiusLinked == '' || pod.radiusLinked == undefined" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusTL' label='Pod top-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusTL}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusTR' label='Pod top-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusTR}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusBR' label='Pod bottom-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusBR}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusBL' label='Pod bottom-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusBL}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.paddingLinked' label='Link pod padding' value='{{pod.paddingLinked}}' default='false' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.padding' label='Pod padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'true' || pod.paddingLinked == '' || pod.paddingLinked == undefined" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingTop' label='Pod top padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingRight' label='Pod right padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingBottom' label='Pod bottom padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingLeft' label='Pod left padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='toggle' size='md' path='stage.paddingLinked' label='Link stage padding' value='{{stage.paddingLinked}}' default='false' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.padding' label='Stage padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'true' || stage.paddingLinked == '' || stage.paddingLinked == undefined" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingTop' label='Stage top padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingRight' label='Stage right padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingBottom' label='Stage bottom padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingLeft' label='Stage left padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Widget appearance' />
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Stage/Pod layout appearance' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='stage.background' label='Background' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='pod.background' label='Widget background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='style'>

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='theme.timerStyle' label='Timer style' placeholder='Choose style' value='{{theme.timerStyle}}' options='[{"label":"Separated boxes","value":"separated"},{"label":"Inline","value":"inline"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='theme.animation' label='Animation' placeholder='Choose animation' value='{{theme.animation}}' options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Fade","value":"fade"},{"label":"Slide","value":"slide"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='theme.separator' label='Separator' placeholder='Choose separator' value='{{theme.separator}}' options='[{"label":"Colon","value":"colon"},{"label":"Dot","value":"dot"},{"label":"Slash","value":"slash"},{"label":"None","value":"none"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='theme.timeFormat' label='Time format' placeholder='Choose format' value='{{theme.timeFormat}}' options='[{"label":"Days:Hours:Minutes:Seconds","value":"DHMS"},{"label":"Days:Hours:Minutes","value":"DHM"},{"label":"Hours:Minutes:Seconds","value":"HMS"},{"label":"Hours:Minutes","value":"HM"},{"label":"Minutes:Seconds","value":"MS"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='theme.showLabels' label='Show labels' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='theme.showDays' label='Show days' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='theme.showHours' label='Show hours' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='theme.showMinutes' label='Show minutes' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='theme.showSeconds' label='Show seconds' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='theme.headingSize' label='Heading size (px)' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='theme.timerSize' label='Timer size (%)' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='theme.labelSize' label='Label size (px)' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='theme.buttonSize' label='Button size (%)' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='behavior'>
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='actions.showButtonDuring' label='Show button' />
<div data-bob-showif="actions.showButtonDuring == 'true'">
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.buttonText' label='Button text' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.buttonUrl' label='Button URL' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.buttonStyle' label='Button style' placeholder='Choose style' value='{{actions.buttonStyle}}' options='[{"label":"Primary","value":"primary"},{"label":"Secondary","value":"secondary"},{"label":"Ghost","value":"ghost"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='actions.openInNewTab' label='Open in new tab' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.afterAction' label='After action' placeholder='Choose action' value='{{actions.afterAction}}' options='[{"label":"Hide timer","value":"hide"},{"label":"Do nothing","value":"nothing"},{"label":"Show button","value":"show-button"}]' />
<div data-bob-showif="actions.afterAction == 'show-button'">
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.afterButtonText' label='After button text' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.afterButtonUrl' label='After button URL' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.expiredMessage' label='Expired message' hint='Offer ended' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show backlink' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='advanced'>

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='settings.language' label='Language' placeholder='Choose language' value='{{settings.language}}' options='[{"label":"English (US)","value":"en-US"},{"label":"Español","value":"es"},{"label":"Français","value":"fr"},{"label":"Deutsch","value":"de"},{"label":"Italiano","value":"it"},{"label":"Português","value":"pt"},{"label":"日本語","value":"ja"},{"label":"中文","value":"zh"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='settings.customCSS' label='Custom CSS' hint='/* Custom CSS */' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textedit' size='md' path='settings.customJS' label='Custom JS (state available as "state")' />
</bob-panel>
